titles.title: Support Our Startups Act of 2012
Support Our Startups Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for start-up expenditures for business for 2012 and 2013.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Support Our Startups Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an increased tax deduction for business start-up expenditures in 2012 and 2013.
